headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KNAPP, RACHELLE (NEE KOLTON)

snippet: KNAPP--Rachelle (nee Kolton). Died at 93 after a life filled with learning, love, and family. Holocaust refugee, married Sidney Knapp and earned a Ph.D. from Columbia University. "Madame Knapp" to hundreds of students at The Juilliard School, The Beekman School, and The Aspen Music Festival. Beloved teacher, mother, and grandmother. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KNAPP--Rachelle (nee Kolton). Died at 93 after a life filled with learning, love, and family. Holocaust refugee, married Sidney Knapp and earned a Ph.D. from Columbia University. "Madame Knapp" to hundreds of students at The Juilliard School, The Beekman School, and The Aspen Music Festival. Beloved teacher, mother, and grandmother. 1/3
